titles: An excellent sonnet of the unfortunate loves, of Hero and Leander Tune of, Gerards mistris.
author: Crouch, Humphrey, fl. 1635-1671.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright,
notes: Verse - "How fares my fair Leander, I vouchsafe to speak,".
Place of publication from Wing, which estimates 1663-1674 as publication date.
Reproduction of the originals in: British Library (reel 2123.2:150-151); University of Glasgow Library (reel 2685:10).
